list.description:
#gunsight #sight #m103 #crosshair

The main numbers now follow the main range markings automatically, so you can use it for any tank you want.
Added code for the longer vertical line (last picture) for slower shells, if you watch the code there will be a "SHORT VERTICAL LINE" and a "LONG VERTICAL LINE", you can comment/delete the one you don't want, your choice (the default line is the long one).
Added a comment indicating that anything past that is code exclusively for the diagonal line, its range markings and the text of the range markings.
Default sight with modifications, biggest ones are

AutoAim Sight

With this #sight you can calculate the distance from an enemy tank easily. It has a visual range measure helper in the right side. Put the enemy tank inside and fit its shape with the two lines. When the tank "touches" the two lines, take the numeric distance. If you are looking the enemy tank from a side, use the first value; if you are looking the tank from the front, use the second value. (See the screenshots attached).

To install, copy the .blk file in the sight folder of the vehicle that you want to change the sight.

For vehicles with a big zoom, use the .blk named autoAi

Missile Sight

Use this #sight in your missile launcher vehicles, like RakjPz HOT.

To install, copy the .blk file in the sight folder of the vehicle that you want to change the sight

Telescopic sight TOP-1.
Archive has version for all tanks, that have this sight in real life. It is all ingame T-26, T-35, T-50 and T-70.

How to use:
The markings are made only for DT machine-gun. For using AP and HE, you need to use the distance table given in the fourth picture or in this table:

20-K
Sight DT AP HE
4 400 500 150
6 600 800 200
8 800 1100 300
10 1000 1500 400

KT-28(on T-26-4 and T-35)
Sight HE
6 180
8 300
10 450

Yes, this makes TOP-1 very uncomfortable and almost useless in the game, but it's historical.

Installation:
1 - Unpack archive to main directory of game(and repla

Periscopic sight PT-1 for 45mm 20-K.
Archive has version for all tanks, that have this sight in real life. It is all ingame T-26 w/ 20-K, all BT, T-126, T-50 and T-70.

How to use:
The markings are made only for AP.
I don't know how to sighting with HE or DT-MG.

Installation:
1 - Unpack archive to main directory of game(and replace, if you have UserSights-folder)
2 - Restart the game or just press ALT+F9 in battle or menu
3 - After the spawn on the desired tank, go to Settings - Main - Tank Combat Settings
4 - Set the option "pt_1" in Use an alternative sighting grid

Problems:
- The sight is

Fictional tank sight for T-35!
You can use 45mm gun and 76.2mm gun's sight in one view!
↓How to Use (GIF)

#T_35 #usersight

Non historical anti aircraft sights.
Made these because the default ones had too much screen clutter.
For close ranges try to keep the plane in the large rectangle or near it.
Vehicles: | Falcon | Flakpanzer 1 Gepard | Type 87 | Vulcan | ZSU-23-4 |
Take the files in the zip folder and dump them into your UserSights file in your War Thunder file
#sights #gunsights

The second revision of my sight. Please update your settings if you have previously downloaded this sight. Installation, as usual. I will not bring her. If anyone does not know, I will add instruction.There are two files in the archive, one (sight_1_TDE_R2) with circles, allowing to use it for AA, the second (sight_1_TDE_R2NC) without circles, if they interfere with you. This is not the sight of "Kill them all!", But it's easy to use. I did not include the distance meters in the sight,include the meter, as the sight itself is such a gauge. The lateral scale of distances is left on purpose, to

Historical Japanese Gunsights:

These sights will work on every WW2 Japanese tank.

The sights should work with any shell type selected as well.

#gunsight #customsight #sight #japan

file version 1.4, Added range assistance for manual range control

To install, while in your hangar:

1. Select the tank you want
2. Go to Game Options > Tank Battle Settings > Use Alternative Gunsight
3. Select Add an aiming gridt sight
4. It will create a folder in your directory, put the gunsight file in there
5. Restart the game

A comical completely historical sight for the KV-2

To install put in your UserSights folder (if you don't have one, make one).

As seen here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u9XTM_hlWSU

#KV2 #Sight #GunSight #Joke

#gunsights #T55A #optic #optics #crosshair #translatedsight

So I got bored and decided to translate BVV_d's gunsights for the T55A from Russian characters and phrases to English. The pack comes with two sights--the 3bm8 sight for APDS and the 3bm25 for APFSDS. Your aiming point is the top of the center arrow. The sight does not change when you switch ammo types as the range indicators for all your ammo types are already there.

And yes the sight will work with the T54 mod 1949 and 51 if you are using the 3bm8 APDS. just copy the 3bm8 blk file into the appropriate T54 mod 49 or 51 folder after

#gunsights #stug #optic #optics #gunsights #crosshair #crosshair #realisticgunsight
(Update)

This adds the Sfl.Z.F scope reticule to most of the vehicles in game that used it. These vehicles are the Dicker Max, Sturer Emil, Nashorn, Hetzer, all StuG variants, Jgdpz. IV, PZ.IV 70, 70(A), and the Sturmpanzer IV, Ferdinand, and Jagdpanthers*.

Note that these sights were based on the coding done in the wonderful Zeiss scope pack (Jerrysights) by ZdrytchX. Please download his sights here: https://live.warthunder.com/post/671151/en/

Update 1: I have added the Ferdinand and the Jagdpanthers to th

Tiger II Custom Sight Made Only For PZGR39/43 (APHE)
How To Use:
1:Create A New Sight For The Tiger II H In The Settings
2:Unzip The File
3:Put The .blk In The Folder Created In "UserSights/germ_pzkpfw_VI_ausf_b_tiger_IIh"
4: Restart The Game And Select The Sight From Where You Created It.

#optics #optic #gunsight #gunsights #crosshair #crosshairs #tigeriih #kingtiger #tiger2h

#T-64A #gunsight
Прицельная сетка по мотивам ТПД 2 49 (прицела дальномера Т-64А). Кольцевую шкалу пока реализовать нельзя, поэтому используется стандартное поле отображения ввода поправки по дальности (сверху по центру). Дальномерная шкала проверена и пристреляна по цели высотой 2.75 метра (проверял по М60А1 на всех дальностях от 500 до 4000м).
Установка обычная, распаковать содержимое архива в UserSights/ussr_t_64a_1971 , выбрать в меню прицел tpd_2_49 ( не путать с уже имеющимся у Т-64А).

#gunsight #sight #chieftain #crosshair

Follow @TheGun31 for similar sights.

https://live.warthunder.com/post/673486/en/ <----- base sight, this sight only has an extra diagonal line for specific use for the L15A3 Chieftain APDS to counter the parallax effect while using realistic sight position (might work for other tanks with similar sight placement, but it won't be as exact).

**** DIAGONAL LINE ONLY ****

The DIAGONAL line and its range markings are specifically made for the Chieftain APDS shell while using the realistic sight position. Any other shell from the Chieftain / any other tank

#gunsight #sight #sights #historical #flak #88mm #ZF20

88mm_Flak_ZF20_v01 by KorEEnium

Z.F 20 gunsight used on 8.8cm Flak guns. This file is for 8.8cm Flak 37 Sfl aka Sd.Kfz 9 8.8cm Flak truck but it can also be used on other vehicles if desired.

This gun has no range markers just like the real one which means you have to use "Sight distance control" to adjust range. Luckily it shows range numbers on the left side of the sight.

Installation and other information on how to set it up for other vehicles and also how to set-up "Sight distance control" are in the zip file.

Realistic rangefinding sight for the T-54 mod. 1947 (TPK-1)
DOES NOT WORK FOR THE APCR (BR-412P), HE (OF-412) AND SMOKE SHELLS (3D3)

Sources:
1. https://thesovietarmourblog.blogspot.com.br/2017/01/t-54.html
2. http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7143/6524835913_2b02ea040e_b.jpg

Install guide:

1. Create UserSights folder in your War Thunder folder, if not already done.
2. Copy all zip file contents to it.
3. Either restart the game or just press ALT+F9 in battle
4. Go to Options -> Main -> Tank Battle Settings
5. Switch Use alternative sight grid to one the custom sight.
6. Profit?

Sight may not

ASU-57 Gun Sight.(Fictional) The Drop Lines Are Solid And Are Accurate Only For APHE.
How To Use:
1:Create A New Sight For The Asu In The Settings
2:Unzip The File
3:Put The .blk In The Folder Created In "UserSights/ussr_asu_57"
4: Restart The Game And Select The Sight From Where You Created It.
Hope You Enjoy This Simple Sight Made For The Asu-57.
Edit: You Dont Actually Have To Create A New One. You Can Simply Skip The 1st Step. Though You Still Have To Select The Sight From The Settings There
#asu57 #optics #optic #gunsight #gunsights #crosshair #crosshairs

Обновил файл, добавил 2 вариант для снарядов 3БМ8 и 3БМ25, исправил сетку КС. Сетка прицела ТШ2Б-32П , подходит для танка Т-55А , также можно использовать на других танках с подобным орудием и набором боеприпасов.

Historical nato sight used most during most of the cold war.
This was really annoying to learn how to make by the way.
take the contents from the zip file and dump them into your usersights file.
#sight
*edit: sorry to the initial down loaders, i forgot to put the chieftain mk10 in there, it's there now. I excluded mbt/kpz-70 on purpose because afaik they wouldn't use that sight.
*added an additional sight, same style but with range numbers on the left for those who are less hardcore
*added a revised sight called Nato sight revised to better look a picture that was shown to me the new sight u

OLD (non-rotating) AND NEW (radial) GERMAN TANK OPTICS FOR EVERYONE - German sight package with on-going Updates! Check changelog in description for changes
If you spot something that is missing or doesn't look right, check back here to see if that tank optics was fixed, or comment below and request a fix.

This is/was an early sight (3rd user sight ever made for WT). The triangles are to true and accurate to the historical mils scale and uses the defualt positioning of the automatic scale which auto-adapts for each shell type. Circles weren't implemented nor rotational indicators. HOWEVER wi
